description: This file defines the interface for the message bus component in the RDK-based system. It contains function declarations related to engaging with the message bus, initialization, finalization, resource management, and status checking. The file includes licensing information, header guards, and function prototypes for communication with the message bus subsystem.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages or connects to the message bus with specified component ID, configuration file, and path.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the message bus interface with user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes or cleans up the message bus interface with user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Checks the status of the message bus with user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources associated with the message bus, given a priority and user data.
